body_html: I don't see where the changes are. The only commit from @gunan that I see is about cuDNN library handling. I would like to contribute more information about optimization. It would help to have some feedback from the TensorFlow maintainers about what the default should be. For example, why is '--config=opt' not recommended when building with the '-c opt' flag?

body: I don't see where the changes are.  The only commit from @gunan that I see is about cuDNN library handling.  I would like to contribute more information about optimization.  It would help to have some feedback from the TensorFlow maintainers about what the default should be.  For example, why is '--config=opt' not recommended when building with the '-c opt' flag?
